question: The government of Maharashtra decided to name the Mumbai-Nagpur Samruddhi expressway after which of the following personalities?
explanation: The government of Maharashtra decided to name the Mumbai-Nagpur Samruddhi expressway after late Bal Keshav Thackeray, the founder of Shiv Sena. The project was expected to be completed within three years. The total estimated project cost was 55,335 crores.
